tool_description: Creates and manages comprehensive child profiles including basic demographics, developmental history, and assessment preferences.

birth_date.description: Child's birth date in ISO format

special_needs.description: Any special needs or conditions affecting development

error_messages: Invalid birth date: Provide a valid ISO date-time format
Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address
Invalid gender option: Use male, female, or not_specified
Future birth date: Birth date cannot be in the future
usage: Enter child's basic information to create a profile for tracking developmental progress. Special needs and language information help customize assessments.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for the child's profile
